product_title: Croma 4 in 1 Convertible 1.5 Ton 3 Star Inverter Split AC with Dust Filter (2024 Model, Copper Condenser, CRLA018IND283258)
overview_text:
Air Conditioner Modes
Experience customized cooling comfort with a range of modes designed to suit your preferences and needs. From Auto mode for automatic temperature adjustment to Turbo mode for rapid cooling, Sleep mode for enhanced comfort during sleep, Dry mode for dehumidification, and ECO mode for energy savings, Croma air conditioner offers versatility and convenience.
 
800 CMH High Air Flow Volume for Efficient Cooling
Stay cool even in extreme temperatures with the Croma air conditioner' impressive cooling capacity and efficient airflow distribution. With an airflow volume of 800 CMH and 2-way air swing, this AC ensures rapid and uniform cooling, making them ideal for any environment, even at temperatures as high as 52 degrees Celsius.
 
Humidity Control
Enjoy enhanced comfort and air quality with built-in humidity control features in the Croma air conditioner. This AC help maintain optimal humidity levels in your space, reducing excess moisture in the air and creating a more comfortable and healthy indoor environment.
 
High Efficiency Inverter Rotary Compressor with Inverter Technology
Experience superior cooling performance and energy efficiency with this conditioner' high-efficiency inverter rotary compressor and advanced inverter technology. These innovative features optimize compressor operation, adjusting cooling capacity based on real-time demand, resulting in energy savings and reduced electricity bills.
 
Stabilizer Free Operation
Eliminate the need for an external stabilizer and enjoy stable operation even during voltage fluctuations with this conditioner's stabilizer-free operation. Designed to withstand voltage variations, this AC ensure reliable performance and protection against power surges, enhancing durability and peace of mind.
 
100% Copper Condenser & Evaporator Coil with Blue Plated Anti-Corrosive Coating
Benefit from enhanced durability and efficient heat transfer with Croma air conditioner's 100% copper condenser and evaporator coil. The blue-plated anti-corrosive coating protects against rust and corrosion, ensuring long-lasting performance and optimal cooling efficiency, even in humid conditions.
 
PM 2.5 Filter with Activated Carbon and Dust Filter:
Breathe cleaner and healthier air with Croma air conditioner's advanced filtration system. Featuring a PM 2.5 filter with activated carbon and dust filter, these ACs effectively remove harmful airborne particles, pollutants, and allergens, providing you with fresh and purified indoor air quality.
 
Leakage Detector and Temperature Sensor
Ensure safety and reliability with Croma air conditioner's built-in leakage detector and temperature sensor. These intelligent features detect potential leaks and monitor temperature variations, allowing for early detection of issues and preventing damage to the AC unit, ensuring uninterrupted cooling performance.
 
Self-Diagnosis Capability for Errors
Experience hassle-free maintenance and troubleshooting with Croma air conditioner's self-diagnosis capability. This AC can detect and identify errors or malfunctions automatically, allowing for quick and accurate diagnosis, minimizing downtime, and ensuring efficient operation.
